MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA2 postcode area of Warrington  affecting properties in Floyd Drive, Athlone Road, Winwick Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12: 46 PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and  are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by  4 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:38 PM on 5th March 2021.
